body.name: Amazon Essentials Girls and Toddlers' Long Quilted Cocoon Puffer Coat
features: OVERSIZED FIT: Generous, comfortable fit through the body
WATER-RESISTANT TAFFETA: Polyester plain weave shell fabric. Fully lined, quilted, and insulated.

COLD WEATHER COAT: This diamond quilted puffer has cozy faux-sherpa lining in the hood and body. Faux-down polyester fill makes this the perfect option for school, daily wear, or play regardless of what the cold weather brings.
FUNCTIONAL PLAY: Features zippered, detachable hood, hand-warmer pockets with snap closure, and dropped back hem for extra coverage in the cold.
DETAILS: Soft-touch polyfill insulation for added warmth without excess bulk.
WATER RESISTANT: This garment is not waterproof, but designed to be water-resistant.
body.description: Amazon Essentials has what you need to outfit your little ones in affordable, high-quality, and long-lasting everyday clothing. Our line of kids' must-haves includes cozy fleeces and oh-so warm puffer jackets to keep them bundled up when the temperatures drop, as well as school uniform-ready pants and polo shirts. Consistent sizing takes the guesswork out of shopping, and each piece is put to the test to maintain parent-approved standards in quality and comfort. productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #2,590 in Our Brands (See Top 100 in Our Brands) #14 in Girls' Outerwear Jackets

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I never want to buy another winter coat again
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely LOVE this coat. LOVE IT. So much so that I hope they continue making the same kind of fit and style, quality and price for the next several years so I can keep purchasing it in different sizes as my children grow.I have 4 kids and have gone through several winter jackets over the years. Disappointed by many. This one doesn’t disappoint in anyway at all for us.The hood is large enough to actually fight my child’s head with some room but doesn’t easily fall back like many other jackets do. The buttons on the hood make it so you can make the hood just a little more snug around their head for extra warmth. You can also easily remove the hood if wanted, by zipper.The jacket is a nice length, covering the bum. We’ve had So many jackets before that would end at the hip and didn’t provide as much warmth as this one. The inside is nice and fuzzy and thick, again providing more warmth.And it doesn’t hurt that the pattern is also very cute.I love this winter coat and I love that I don’t have to worry if my child is warm or covered enough!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Quality + So WARM
reviews.reviewText: I love this coat for my toddler! It has kept her warm and cozy on incredibly cold days, allowing us to be outdoors. She loves the pockets, and stops to tuck her hands in when they get cold. I love the removable hood and the length of the coat, which hits mid-thigh and covers up any gap between her pants and shirt. Very cute.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Warm and well made
reviews.reviewText: This is a very nice, high quality coat. It’s lightweight and kept my daughter very warm and comfortable. The price is unbelievable because something like this is usually very expensive. It’s fashionable and will not disappoint. I sized up and it definitely doesnt look too big, also I don’t want to buy a new jacket every year. It fits very well when we do one fold on the sleeves. Definitely good for the next two years!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great warm coat!
reviews.reviewText: This coat is so warm for my 4 year old. I love how it is long and goes to about her knees but she is still able to run and play comfortably outside. Great color and quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very cute and warm
reviews.reviewText: My daughter really likes, don’t get dirty, because I haven’t been able to get stains out of it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The cutest warmest coat for a great price!
reviews.reviewText: This is so cute! We love the detachable hood and the fleece/sherpa inside is so so soft. It’s great for a snow day for our toddler! Coming back to buy one for my son! It’s not very heavy but still great for layering!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute, Cozy and Warm
reviews.reviewText: I like the length, detachable hood and warm cozy lining. Granddaughter loved the pretty pink.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very happy with this purchase
reviews.reviewText: Great quality kids jacket! I was looking for something knee length for my daughter to wear to school when it’s cold in the morning. This jacket happened to be on a “Limited Deal” and it popped up when I searched for the Columbia brand. I decided to give it a whirl since the price was discounted. And I thought she’d like the burnt orange color. Honestly, I’d pay full price for this jacket now that I see what great quality it is and how much my 9 year old loves it.It’s not heavy, but it’s definitely not a “light weight” jacket. Lately, it’s been in the high 40’s to mid 50’s in the morning here and this jacket has been keeping her warm.The jacket body and hood are Sherpa lined…and it’s soft Sherpa, not the cheap itchy kind. The hood is removable. It’s easy enough for a child to remove and reattach it - very happy about that.I will probably purchase this again next year for her, if it’s still available. :)

Es lindo el diseño, el material de buena calidad también. El unico detalle que le encontramos es que es demasiado voluminosa, a mi hija le parece incomodo realizar actividades basicas con la chamarra puesta. Lo unico que le ha encantado a ella es que en verdad es super calentita.

Your child will be love this coat. Color is so vibrant and the quilt stitches are quality as well. Thick and warm. The long is perfect my daughter is 8 years old and 142cm and coat sit just above her knee.
Die Jacke war für meine Tochter sie fand es super. Es ist sehr kuschelig und geeignet für den Winter. Man kann auch die Flecken leicht abwaschen. Ich empfehle es.
È molto carino taglia 10 anni è stata perfetta ed è caldissimo

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I do love these coats. But only a month in and The stitches are coming out.Bought two of these coats for my twin granddaughters 9 th birthday. They are beautiful. Lovely colours. True to size, an soo warm . thank you
